001package org.nasdanika.emf;
002
003import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.Diagnostic;
004import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.DiagnosticException;
005import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
006import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.Diagnostician;
007import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
008import org.nasdanika.common.ContextFactory;
009import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
010
011/**
012 * Validates {@link EObject} and then creates a context from it. Throws a {@link DiagnosticException} if validation level is error.
013 * @author Pavel
014 *
015 */
016public class ValidatingEObjectContextFactory implements ContextFactory<EObject> {
017
018        @Override
019        public Context createContext(EObject input) {
020                Diagnostician diagnostician = new Diagnostician();
021                Diagnostic inputDiagnostic = diagnostician.validate(input);
022                if (inputDiagnostic.getSeverity() == Diagnostic.ERROR) {
023                        throw new ExecutionException(new DiagnosticException(inputDiagnostic));
024                }               
025                return new EObjectContext(input);
026        }
027
028}
